info.title: Detnet-Licence-Server API
info.description: An API for providing licence management services to DetNet's channel partners and their customers.

servers.description: Heroku server for internal staging and testing.

get.description: Returns returns the welcome home page.

401.description: Access token is missing or invalid.

500.description: An unexpected error has occurred. Please forgive us, we didn't see it coming.

post.description: Log into the licence server using credentials.

404.description: The requested user could not be retrieved.

get.description: Returns a list of users existing in the system, according to the privilege/role of the requesting user.

parameters.name: company_id
parameters.description: A unique identifier associated with a company.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: The field by which to order the returned elements.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order in which to arrange the returned elements.

200.description: The list of users retrieved successfully.

total.description: The total number of elements that exist.

limit.description: The total number of elements to return.

offset.description: Starting index of the list of elements to return.

401.description: Access token is missing or invalid.

404.description: The requested users list could not be retrieved.

500.description: An unexpected error has occurred. Please forgive us, we didn't see it coming.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A unique identifier associated with a particular object.

parameters.description: The company that owns the licence.

parameters.name: licence_code

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return.

parameters.name: sortby
parameters.description: The field by which to order the returned elements.

tags.name: SUPER
tags.description: Maintains and administers all resources of the application.

tags.name: DISTRIBUTOR
tags.description: Has privileges to manage resources among administered companies.

tags.name: MANAGER
tags.description: Has privileges to manage resources within a specific company.

tags.name: USER
tags.description: Has privileges to manage only their own resources.
